summary.description: Experienced in Business Information Systems and leadership, I possess skills in agile development, full-stack web development, and machine learning. Committed to community engagements and mentorships, I bring advanced analytical thinking and computer literacy into your organization. I am eager to leverage these abilities to drive your organizational success. Additionally, I have utilized various tools such as Slack, Zoom, and Microsoft Teams for communication and presentation purposes in both academic and work experiences, showcasing my adaptability and proficiency in modern communication technologies.

academic-qualifications.description1: Electronic Records Management, Web and Intranet Management, Strategic Information Management, Management Information Systems, Research Methodology, Business Intelligence and Competitive Intelligence.

certifications: African Insight UJ online short Course
references: Mr Wole Akinola, UJ and Accenture Collaboration - Work Readiness Program Coordinator and Lecturer
Dr Sthembiso Khumalo, University of Johannesburg - My Research Supervisor and Lecturer
